page.title: 08THE VICAR OF BATTYEFORD
page.content: On 12th of June 1960 Mr.Wilkinson was ordained.He went to work at the William Temple Church in Manchester as a curate.In 1963 he moved to St.Peters church in Morley.In 1965 he moved to the All Saints Church in Roberttown as a vicar.He moved to his present church,Christ The King Battyeford in 1975. Before he became a clergyman he was training to be a Quantity Surveyor but he gave it up to become clergyman. He thought that God wanted him to be a Vicar.He believed that God had made the decision for him and he never regrets taking the opportunity.Mr.Wilkinson has a lot of support in his job.He has 2 readers,(Mr.Brooke & Mrs.Smith). He gets up at about 7.00am.He does not work 365 days a year as he takes 1 day off a week & 3 weeks holiday.
